GameData:
- -
Are you still going on? -
What part of 'uh-uh' didn't you understand? -
You keep asking, I'll keep saying no. -
I said no already! -
Hello again! -
Welcome back! -
Ugh, you again. -
Spit it out already.
-
Hey, it's my favorite big person! -
Hey again! Care for a frogsicle? -
There you are! Have you seen my white scarf? It blew off in the snow and now I can't find it. -
Huh? Where'd you come from? -
What brings you here today? -
Oh, hello there. -
Oh, as soon as the big thing disappears, this small thing appears. What do you want? -
You again? Shouldn't you have fallen in a hole by now? -
Great, it's my least favorite big person. -
Come to gloat, have you? Well, we can still turn this around! Soon you'll be gloating out of the other side of your face! -
Oh, we're building up a counterattack. A really cool one. Like you won't even believe how great it is. But if you want to declare peace so you don't have to defend against it, we'll go along with you. -
This war is getting really boring. -
Can we go back to peace so I can go back to goofing off instead of worrying about you? -
What, we're still at war? Aren't you over whatever it was? Because if we started this one, then we're totally over it. -
Give up yet? -
Ha! Here for peace? I'm not even winded! -
Come to say uncle? -
Hey. How's our Research Agreement going? -
Oh, did you come by to make more promises you don't plan to keep? -
Hey pal! Here to plan some more mischief? -
That {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} weirdo is getting on our nerves. -
We ready to wreck {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} yet? -
With you and me together, {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} is going down! -
Ready to divvy up {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}'s stuff? I got first dibs on anything ice cream-related. -
What, are you bored of losing the war you're already in, so now you want to lose one against us? -
Hey. How's your whole war going? Because it looks really pretty from over here. -
Hey, are you here to quit pretending and declare war already? Bring it on! -
I hope you're here to talk about why you think our borders need, like, a zillion of your army guys hanging around them. -
What is it now, greedy? -
What do you want to talk about? Because I want to talk about why you keep jumping all up in my land! -
Buddy, you keep buying land like that, we're going to have to buy it back with a danmaku discount! If you get what I mean. Do you get what I mean? I mean we're gonna go to war and I'll conquer it. -
Stop buying up all that land! My fairies keep trying to go there and they just get lost. -
I may still be the strongest, but you're easily a close second. What can I do ya for? -
Oh man, you have got so much money! Can I have that hat your attendant's wearing? I bet you have like twenty more of them! -
Here for advice? My tip: you're supposed to be building cities, instead of whatever dumb thing you're doing. -
Where's your army? Were you just planning to pull one out at the last second when you need it? Because that's what we do, not you! -
Ooh, ooh, are you here to pick a fight? -
What do you want? -
Make it snappy, I got stuff to do. -
What, now you want to talk? Are you confused? ...Wait, now I'm confused. -
Oh great, that weirdo {1_PlayerName} brought a friend. -
Hi! {1_PlayerName} told me you'd be coming, but I forgot to do anything about it. -
Why did you denounce {1_PlayerName}? I can think of like nine people who deserve it more. -
You hate {1_PlayerName}? Me too! -
I don't even know you! -
I know everyone wants to be friends with the strongest fairy, but I need to know at least a little about you first. -
{1_CivName} are jerks and we're telling everyone about it. You on board? -
I'm totally wrecking face on {1_CivName}. Want to come along? (WILL DECLARE WAR IMMEDIATELY) -
Oh. Oh, I see how it is. You thought just because I was a fairy, I'd forget your promise. Well I wrote it down, jerk, and now I'm telling everyone about you![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]) -
I'm going to tell everyone about your betrayal, so nobody's dumb enough to try and help you when I get my revenge![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]) -
I don't know why I ever thought we were friends. No, really. Do you remember?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]) -
Ha ha... Is that so? -
Oh, you are gonna wish you hadn't badmouthed the strongest fairy! -
I saw you allied with {1_CivName}. I like those guys too. Would you recommend it? -
I wouldn't get too chummy with {1_CivName} if I was you. But then again if I was you I wouldn't be the smartest fairy, so I might make really bad decisions. -
Hey, we like {1_CivName}! Lay off! -
Oh, I totally hate {1_CivName} too. -
You're allies with {1_CivName}? Me too! We should plan some kind of party. -
We denounced {1_CivName} too. Glad to see someone around here respects fairies' opinions! -
So you teamed up with {1_CivName}? Perfect! Bundling arrows together just means I can break them all faster! -
You pick a fight with {1_CivName}, you pick a fight with me. And if you pick a fight with me, you get beaten up!
-
Stop snorking up all my land! Just because I wasn't doing anything with it then doesn't mean I didn't want it. -
Does "Okay, Cirno, I'll stop expanding near you because I respect you so much since you are the strongest in the world and also your hair is very nice" mean something different in your language? Because that's exactly what I recall you saying! -
Stop buying up all those plots of land! Mystia had her grilled lamprey stand set up for two months before she figured out you'd expanded your territory around her! -
Stop buying up all that land, or at least give me first crack at it. Rumia likes to wander around there, and she can't see out of her little darkness ball, so if you start claiming land and moving things she just bumps into trees for hours. -
Did I not just tell you to stop buying up all that land? -
Just so you know, I'm turning one of your little toadies into an ice sculpture. Then we're all gonna draw on them with crayons. -
Letty says that the small fry we're attacking was your friend. We're still cool though, right? -
Wait a second, Pacts of Cooperation were patched out of the game! Hax! I call hax! -
Want to sign a Declaration of Friendship? With the strongest fairy on your side, you'll do great! -
Can we make a Declaration of Friendship? We found a bunch of yarn the other day, and now a lot of us fairies want to make friendship bracelets out of it. -
You suck, and now everyone else knows it. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]She has publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]) -
I'm warning all the other leaders what a weirdo you are. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]She has publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]) -
Pact of Cooperation end - Warmonger (shouldn't appear) -
Pact of Cooperation end - Citystates (shouldn't appear) -
Pact of Cooperation end - Taking all the land (shouldn't appear) -
Pact of Cooperation end - Wonders (shouldn't appear) -
Pact of Cooperation end - Victory Conditions (shouldn't appear) -
Pact of Cooperation end - Timeout (shouldn't appear) -
{1_PlayerName:textkey} Pact of Secrecy (shouldn't appear) [NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Will not cause you to declare war) -
{1_PlayerName:textkey} Pact of Secrecy end (shouldn't appear) -
If you're as sick of {1_PlayerName:textkey} as I am, then you'll join the war I'm starting. You in? -
We're all getting ready to beat up {1_PlayerName:textkey}. You're welcome to come along! -
Hey, guess what time it is? Time to run a war on {1_PlayerName:textkey}! -
I try to be a nice fairy. I try to take it easy. But you keep pushing my buttons, and now you've gone too far! -
Now we're enemies. And that means danmaku! -
Thanks to our alliance, now everyone knows not to take fairies so lightly! And they think you're pretty cool as well. -
I got my fingers stuck in this weird finger-trap-straw-thing. I tried freezing it, but that just made it worse. -
All the fairies like my igloo. I tried telling them how to make their own, but most of them just melt overnight. -
I like a good war as much as the next fairy, but geez, tone it down a bit, would ya? -
Are you trying to squeeze us out of {1_MinorCivName:textkey}? After we gave them that macaroni drawing of their prime minister?
-
All you shrine maidens look alike. -
You have a big nose. Everyone's thinking it, and I said it! -
Are you guys barbarians? I always wanted to ask you guys how you kept making huts out of nothing in the middle of nowhere. -
I think I'll go for a stroll and beat up your whole army today. Then once I'm warmed up, I'll actually start my workout! -
Guess who has nuclear weapons? Go on, guess. Give up? It's us! Fairies have nukes! -
You pushed Daiyousei into a puddle and made her cry, you bully! -
Man, everyone in your civilization is so miserable all the time. You stopped badmouthing fairies, now you wish you were fairies! -
Hey, Letty wants us to have a Fairy Fun Run. Can we use the borders of your empire for our start and finish lines? We don't want to be running for too long. -
Where did all your people go? There's barely anyone to play pranks on! -
I just showed a crayon drawing of my igloo to one of your citizens and she started gasping in awe at it. I think I'm gonna have it framed now!
-
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war. -
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
-
No. -
Okay, we'll try and keep out of your yard. -
No! Fairies need to fly free! Also we can't tell what land is yours from up in the air anyway. -
Great, let's shake on it! Don't do a spit shake though. Your spit will freeze our hands together. -
Pass. -
Eh, I don't feel like it. -
This is a Pact of Secrecy line so it shouldn't appear. -
Fairies are always ready to throw down! Let's do this! -
Of course the fairies are behind your war! Just gimme, like, ten turns to herd everyone together. -
Ugh, all right. -
I could beat you up for this, but I would much rather take a nap, so I'll give you what you want. -
Ha! You think a little crybaby pipsqueak like you can make demands of the strongest fairy in Gensokyo? -
Sorry, I can't hear it when weaklings talk, so all I see is big goofy lips flapping and nothing coming out. -
Oh, if you want it that bad, why don't you come and try and take it? I'll even tell the first two waves of fairies to make it Easy Mode for you! -
No! In fact, I'm probably going to declare war over this! ...If I find my official war-declaring paper before I forget to. -
No! -
Get bent. -
What, were you going to ask for the fillings in my teeth too, but figured you'd be realistic? No! Also, my teeth don't have fillings. Joke's on you! -
No way, if I make a deal I want a fair one. -
Again with this? I said no already! -
Quit bugging me!
-
... -
How about we call this war a draw? -
I'm bored of this war. Will this end it? -
I need this stuff. I'm making a giant, mobile snowman. Give me the parts I need, and it will conquer you last! -
Hey, did you know that it's impossible to kiss your own elbow? Because long story short, Letty did, and now I need to pay off a pretty big bet with her. -
Oh, this would be great for Lily's thing collection! She collects... some kind of things, and this is a thing, it's perfect! -
Surely you can't be using these, right? They look like a lot of fun to mess with! -
Hey, want some of our spare resources? There's only a little bit of pudding on them, you can hardly notice. -
Surprise, here's a gift for you! We all picked it out together. Wriggle wrapped it, so if there's any bugs in the paper, that's why. -
We need to pass through your borders on our way to do important fairy business. You know. -
I want to plan to make a Reasearch Agreement later. But I don't think this text ever actually appears.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Agreeing will not form a Research Agreement yet) -
Hey, can we make an official Research Agreement? Before you laugh, I assure you that fairies are very helpful in a science lab! -
Our deal's about to run out, but I'd rather it kept going. Less work that way. -
This deal's running out, but I want more on my end if I'm gonna renew it.
-
I'll take it! -
Why, thank you! -
Thanks! Generosity to fairies has a way of being rewarded. -
That checks out. I think. I didn't quite do all the math. -
That'll do. -
Good enough. -
Yeah, you're darn right you accept! -
That's what I thought. -
Deal. Now let's put this whole confusing mess behind us. -
How generous! -
I need more than that. -
Those two sides don't look even at all! -
No way. -
What, do you think I'm some kind of moron who'll accept that? Well the one saying "moron" is the real moron, so that means the real moron is you! -
Ha ha, real funny, what was your real offer? -
That looks fine to me already. -
That works for me if it works for you. -
Okay, how's abouuuut... this? -
Does this look good? I can throw in some more grilled lampreys if you need. -
How's this look? -
I can't think of any way to make that work. -
Nothing can make that work.
-
You wanna challenge Cirno, freezer of crybabies? Bring it on! -
If it's a fight you want, I'll be happy to oblige! -
Fight! Fight! Fight! -
All right, it's a real challenge! I was getting bored beating up these weaklings! -
Oh, someone who thinks the fairies will roll over just because our army is way smaller? We'll see who does the rolling, and who gets rolled up into a ball! -
You want to exploit our weakness? Fairies have no weaknesses! Insects and sparrows have a couple, but fairies cover for them! -
Cirno's the strongest, and you're getting clobbered! -
Once I freeze the puny army you have now, that's when you bring out the REAL threat, right? -
Ohhhhhh, buddy, you are not going to like the part that comes after this. -
Come on, if you think you can take the fairies on! -
It's a fight! I won't back down! -
Finally, some action! Let's do this! -
At last, we will meet on the battlefield! Well. Like, above the battlefield, like thirty feet or so. You know what I meant! -
Don't take fairies so lightly! We'll beat you back! -
Oh good, I felt like beating the snot out of someone today! -
What? I thought we were friends! Unless... you're attacking me as a favor so I can beat some big people up, in which case, thanks, buddy! -
Oh man, I told the others you were cool! -
I knew it! I knew you couldn't be trusted! That's why I made an icicle dagger back when we first met, and hid it in... No, wait, never mind, I just realized why that won't work.
-
I challenge your civilization to danmaku battle! Fairies will fill the sky with bullets! -
It's time I cleaned the weaklings and the weirdos out of here, starting with you! -
In case you were wondering, now's the part of the story where Cirno beats you up and kicks you out of your house! -
You lied to us! Well, I can do that too. I am NOT sending armies of fairies to counterattack you right now. -
You're cramping our style, and that won't end well for you! -
We can't be penned in any more! I claim your kingdom in the name of fairies everywhere! Also bugs, sparrows and whatever Rumia is. -
Knock knock. Who's there? Cirno, here to conquer the world! -
Once I take all you losers out, I'll be the Extra Stage boss for the whole world! -
This is it! This is our chance to prove once and for all that fairies aren't to be taken lightly, we'll show the whole world how serious we can be! Let the Great Fairy War... BEGIN! -
I see an opportunity, I jump on it! Just like I do for snacks and trampolines! -
And now here comes Cirno to mop up what's left of you! -
You didn't think I'd just ignore how open you made yourself, did you? -
No youkai, god, or army scares me! I'll show you that recklessness is bravery! Attack! -
Nobody else thinks I can beat you... which means that when I do, I'll get your stuff AND a bunch of bet money! -
So long, sucker! -
Cirno the ice fairy always fights fair, but you were too dumb to notice and walked into a trap anyway! -
You thought I was cozying up to you because you were bigger than us... but I was really getting close to your heart, so I could stab it with an icicle! Attack! -
Aw man, we gotta go to war now. I kinda liked you. -
After I blow up your stuff and stop your plans, can we still be friends? That's usually how it goes in Gensokyo. -
Oh. So you want to be conquered first, then! A-ha-ha!
-
What do you got? -
Go ahead. -
Make me an offer. -
Okay, that's cool with me. -
This looks like more fun than fighting you would be, so I'll take it. -
No! I still have plenty of motivation! -
No way, not when I'm winning! -
No. We just started, give me a few turns to enjoy it!
-
Excellent. -
This is good. -
Neat. -
Thank you. -
Appreciate it! -
Thanks. -
That's a shame. -
Well, that's no good. -
I'm not mad, but I am disappointed. -
All right then. -
Very well. -
You will regret this. -
Thanks for the workers back! You would think they could just fly over everything like Remilia's maids, but Remilia's maids don't stop and get distracted by every rock, river and tree. -
Cool! Those workers are throwing a parade in your honor. The parade is just half a wagon and a dog, but it's the thought that counts. -
Hey. HEY! That was our land! Give that back! And stop putting spiky things all over it! -
If you wanna start a war, there's easier ways to do it! -
Joke's on you, fairies don't die! -
...Okay... but I got my eye on you! -
Joke's on you, fairies don't die! -
...Okay... but I got my eye on you! -
Ha ha, is that so? ...Rumia was right. That IS fun to say. -
Yes. That's right. -
Oh, don't be like that, they're just pipsqueaks! -
How predictable. -
Then we're done with you. No more fairy stuff, you're cut off! -
Okay, good. Glad we got that out of the way. -
Okay, good. Glad we got that out of the way. -
Okay, good. Glad we got that out of the way. -
Okay, good. Glad we got that out of the way. -
Did you decide? -
Okay, good. Glad we got that out of the way. -
We have nukes now! It's a good thing fairies don't get cancer because I will be honest, we spend a lot of time playing around on them.
-
Hooray! It's good to see someone else following the path of Freedom. What's the point of anything if you can't mess around and have fun? -
Greetings comrade! I'm pleased to see you also have chosen to follow the path of Order. Because, uh, trying to keep order with fairies is really hard, and I could use some help. -
Ah, someone else who picked the path of Autocracy! We're probably going to end up fighting each other by the end of all this, but it'll be a good, clean, fun fight! -
Did you actually steal technology from me? Really? I don't know what makes me madder, that you would try or that you could pull it off. -
Okay, this is getting silly. Could you just pull your spies out of my cities? It's really obvious that the only person around taller than two and a half feet is your spy, but everyone is too nice to say anything, and it's getting really awkward. -
See, that wasn't that hard! -
I should have known you'd be dumb enough to keep trying. -
All right, fine, I'll call them back. But I bet you'll miss us when we're gone! -
No! Fairies bring joy and seasons and danmaku wherever they go, you can't stop that just because of a little bit of espionage! -
Oh-ho-ho! Now we'll be ready for whatever that {@1_CivAdjective} plan can throw at us. It's gonna be great! -
Hey, the bug message service just told me {1_PlayerName} is plotting against you. If you find out anything juicy, I hope you'll tell me about it too! -
Hey, the bug message service just told me {1_PlayerName} is gearing up to attack {2_CityName}. If you find out something juicy, I hope you'll tell me about it too! -
Hey, the bug message service just told me {1_PlayerName} is getting ready to attack you. They didn't say where the army was going, bugs aren't very good with directions. -
Hey, the bug message service just told me {1_PlayerName} is loading up a bunch of boats to go attack {2_CityName}. If you find out something juicy, I hope you'll tell me about it too! -
Hey, the bug message service just told me {1_PlayerName} is loading up a bunch of boats to attack you. They didn't say where the navy was going, bugs aren't very good with directions. -
I caught your spy tring to steal from us. Because I'm nice, I'll give you the ice sculpture I made out of 'em. -
So, apparently you killed one of my fairies in your city? She just came back and told me it was a big misunderstanding, she thought your lab was a candy store. No hard feelings? -
Oh, this is gonna be about that whole spying thing, isn't it? -
A big person just broke into one of my labs during fairy naptime, stole some technology, and drew all over my science fairies' faces with a magic marker. You wouldn't have anything to do with that, would you? -
Quit spreading your religion in my empire! We already have one, and two religions is just confusing. Everyone just starts praying in the wrong direction, eating incense, it's a mess! -
Yeah, that's fair, I guess. -
No harm, no foul. -
Good. We need a separation of church and... other church, I guess. -
Ugh, you're a religious weirdo. -
Well, okay, I'll tell everyone to stop spreading the Good News in your territory, but they'll be pretty confused. -
No! Fairies will spread the gospel whether you like it or not. Why don't you want your people to be happy, huh? -
Say uncle! Say it! Say uncle! -
I'm willing to accept your surrender instead of having to go to all the trouble of smooshing every last bit of resistance. -
Give up yet? Because if you don't give up soon, you won't have many more chances!
-
Is that so? -
Darn right. -
Oh, come on, it was just a pipsqueak! -
Okay, we cool. -
I'd make an offer, but anything I could give would be a rip-off for you. -
I can't give you what that's worth. -
We'd like to establish an embassy in your capital. Well, okay, it's not so much an 'embassy' as it is a 'pillow fort'. -
We'd like to establish an embassy in your capital. Well, okay, it's not so much an 'embassy' as it is a 'pillow fort'.
